name: Gobi Desert
hint: A vast desert in northern China and southern Mongolia, known for dinosaur fossil discoveries

name: Thar Desert
hint: A large arid region in northwestern India and eastern Pakistan, also called the Great Indian Desert

name: Tibetan Plateau
hint: The highest and largest plateau in the world, often called the 'Roof of the World'

name: Deccan Plateau
hint: A large plateau in southern India, bounded by the Eastern and Western Ghats mountain ranges

name: Siberian Taiga
hint: The world's largest terrestrial biome, a vast boreal forest stretching across northern Russia

name: Arabian Desert
hint: A vast desert covering most of the Arabian Peninsula, including the Rub' al Khali (Empty Quarter)

name: Western Ghats
hint: A UNESCO World Heritage mountain range along the western coast of India, a biodiversity hotspot

name: Sundarbans
hint: The world's largest mangrove forest, spanning the delta of the Ganges in Bangladesh and India
